api_list.name: GenerateOTP
api_list.description: Generate 10 digits unique OTP based on current time and date
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://timebasedotp.p.rapidapi.com/TimebasedOTP"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "timebasedotp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://timebasedotp.p.rapidapi.com/TimebasedOTP"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "timebasedotp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
